entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-0056: Microsoft.Data.SqlClient and System.Data.SqlClient SQL Data provider Information Disclosure Vulnerability #292
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-0057: .NET Security Feature bypass Vulnerability #291
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21319: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #290
  • .NET January 2024 Updates #289

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.IO.FileSystem.Watcher.Tests Fails with Open File Descriptors Limit Reached when TestReadyToRun is Enabled #96728
    Future
  • AppDomain System.Runtime.Extensions.Tests Fails with not Provided Filename Error when TestReadyToRun is Enabled #96727
    Future
  • System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests Fails with 'Language C# is not supported` Error when TestReadyToRun is Enabled #96726
    Future
  • System.Threading.Threads.Tests Fails at ApartmentState_AttributePresent when TestReadyToRun is Enabled #96722
    Future
  • Provide ComObjectWrapper-only support for Dual COM interfaces #96720
  • [API Proposal]: Add a simple option to inject the default/system TimeProvider. #96717
  • Reported issues / open problems related to the merged test infrastructure #96716
    9.0.0
  • [libraries-jitstress] Assertion failed 'ValidateUse(tree) && "Expected use of local to be tailcall value"' #96715
    9.0.0
  • Mono JIT being called each time a function pointer is called #96710
  • C# HttpListener will show ObjectDisposedException if you stop listen after start listen immediately #96705
  • ILVerification fails unexpectedly when encountering duplicate forwarders #96702
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-0057: .NET Security Feature bypass Vulnerability #96700
  • ILVerification fails unexpected on delegate construction with instance method #96695
  • [TestFailure] System.Net.Security.Tests.CertificateValidationRemoteServer.DefaultConnect_EndToEnd_Ok #96689
  • Support async serialization for `JsonNode` and `JsonElement` types. #96688
    Future
  • XMLSerializer UnknownAttribute event does not fire on built-in types #96683
  • Net8: ConfigurationBinder resets sub objects stored in dictionaries to default for json defined empty objects #96682
    Future
  • Combine multiple `IConfiguration` into one does not completely override the values #96681
    Future
  • Some tests in `parseTest` are never run. #96679
  • Size regression on win-x64 with managed objwriter #96665
  • [ios] Support bundling shared libraries into frameworks #96664
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT staticlib crashes with SIGSEGV inside `RhpNewArray` when linked with -dead_strip #96663
  • Unable to verify signer of OCSP Response on Linux #96659
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 1/6/2024 11:51:20 AM #96697
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 30 Regressions on 1/3/2024 6:04:00 PM #96694
  • ConfigurationBinder Source Generator doesn't support IEnumerable types with same functionality as reflection based binder #96652
    9.0.0

Closed

  • Unnecessarily preserved cctor if an instance field is touched #96655
  • Trim analyzer doesn't see members on open generic type #86633
    9.0.0
  • GCSettings not being honored #92458
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Method to translate `PosixSignal` values to native signal numbers #61889
    Future
  • X509Certificates tests fail with PlatformNotSupportedException on Apple devices #96690
  • [browser][MT] The WebSocket is not connected. #88084
    9.0.0
  • [browser] Fragile WebSocket CI tests #90257
    9.0.0
  • Unable to establish SSL Connection issue - After OS Upgrade #95778
  • MemoryExtensions.Split with white space seprator and StringSplitOptions.TrimEntries trims the seprator of last range if destination isn't enough long #96579
  • [Test Failure] Expect100Continue_WaitsExpectedPeriodOfTimeBeforeSendingContent #96484
    9.0.0
  • Roslyn generates corrupt assembly with 65535 (0xFFFF) fields - BadImageFormatException (0x8013110E) #94890
    9.0.0
  • Fast-path source generator not honoring `JsonIgnoreCondition.WhenWritingNull` for `Nullable<T>` properties. #96404
    9.0.0
  • Restore the Microsoft.NETCore.DotNetHostResolver package as a non-shipping package #96151
  • Assertion failed 'next != nullptr' #96642
    9.0.0
  • Support reducing size of LOH threshold #12959
    Future
  • genEventing.py needs some refactoring #12962
    Future
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 7/23/2023 2:51:47 PM #91943
    9.0.0
  • Regressions from "Remove AO from CastHelpers.LdelemaRef/StelemRef" #90931
    9.0.0
  • lambda select bug #95813

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #96725
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #96724
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #96723
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Add ActiveIssue Annotations to Failing TestReadyToRun Tests and Reenable the Executables #96721
    disabled-test, area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Skip tailcall IR validation for struct calls #96719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #96718
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • Move setting variables to HelixPreCommands #96713
    area-Infrastructure
  • Make NegotiateAuthentication.[Compute/Verify]IntegrityCheck APIs public #96712
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Make RandomAccess.Read*|Write* methods work with non-seekable files #96711
    area-System.IO
  • Parse CallConvSwift in CoreCLR/NativeAOT and block struct types #96707
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • PlaceInterfaceMethod is now more optimized #96703
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add WasmDedup=false to S.N.Tensors.Tests #96701
    area-System.Numerics
  • Remove the concept of packable fields from EEClass #96699
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] - CancellationToken for JSWebWorker #96696
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Delete BundleHelper test project #96693
    area-Host
  • Move arm64 insOpts entries into insGroupOpts #96692
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove fgExpandQmarkForCastInstOf #96687
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] ObjWriter: Produce COMDAT sections for .xdata unwinding data #96686
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [HybridGlobalization] Include all globalization symbols #96684
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, needs-author-action
  • Fix BigNumberTools and BigIntTools #96680
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [riscv64] fix linq MixedScope test #96671
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix fast-path support for ignoring nullable value types #96669
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Use NuGetAuthenticate@1 instead of @0 (#96651) #96667
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • [mono] Enable Interop/UnmanagedCallersOnlyBasic on mini-arm64 #96657
    area-Interop-mono
  • Move PendingTypeLoadTable from the ClassLoader object to a global structure #96653
    area-VM-coreclr

Merged

  • Include symbols in main package for NativeAOT runtime packs #96675
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0] Use NuGetAuthenticate@1 instead of @0 (#96651) #96668
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Do not keep cctor for instance fields #96656
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use NuGetAuthenticate@1 instead of @0 #96666
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #96709
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #96708
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #96706
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0] Reset OOB packages from the December Release in the January Release #96704
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, 8.0.x
  • Update branding to 8.0.2 #96422
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 6.0.27 #96420
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.16 #96421
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Short diff summary #96637
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use OriginalDefinition to get members of generic types #96648
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [iOS] Skip PublicPrivateKey_IndependentLifetimes_DSA test #96685
    area-System.Security
  • Make it possible for arrays to have default-implemented methods #96672
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix XUnitLogChecker detection for local test runs #96638
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix emitUnitTests.sh to work with JitEmitUnitTestsSections #96691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix endian issue in AssemblySaveILGeneratorTests #96606
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, community-contribution
  • Add test for GetInterfaces() array type #96589
    area-VM-reflection-mono
  • Revert "[HybridGlobalization] Fix xamarin_macios build after system ICU change" #96658
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [mono] Enable some of the disabled JIT/Directed/callconv/ runtime tests on mini-arm64 #96243
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable activation injection for unix #95555
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix fast-path support for ignoring nullable value types #96639
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Use NuGetAuthenticate@1 instead of @0 #96651
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Invalidate old loop table immediately #96613
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Simplify `BasicBlock::CloneBlockState` #96617
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove checks on loop number in fgCanCompactBlocks #96479
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • For RuntimeTypeValue make it dependent on SupportsFrozenRuntimeTypeInstances #96654
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix last block removal during layout optimization #96649
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add debug-only use of new AssemblyBuilder.Save in Regex.CompileToAssembly #96462
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add .NET 8 test project for System.Numerics.Tensors #96641
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors

Updated

  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_IH_3A` to `SVE_JO_3A` #95994
    arch-arm64, area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • JIT: Allow BBJ_COND false target to diverge from bbNext in layout optimization phase #96609
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Create preheaders on new loops and delete old loop canonicalization #96647
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] [android] Bump to win 11 helix queue #96634
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [IGNORE] Testing `Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0` PR #96459
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Build-mono
  • Move to building with the 9.0 SDK and move our ToolCurrent TFM to 9.0 #95980
    area-Infrastructure, 9.0.0
  • [release/6.0] fix IsMutuallyAuthenticated on SslStream #92684
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 6.0.x
  • STJ: set initial capacity of JsonObject if known (#96417) #96486
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Faster lookup for method infos on Windows. #96283
    os-windows, tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Inline TLS access for windows/x64 #89472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Re-add Stack Overflow handling in NativeAOT with larger alternate stack #95808
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Simplify methodtable #96466
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Introduce CallConvSwift and special register types to represent the Swift ABI calling convention #95065
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Use multi-reg load/store for EncodeToUtf8 #95513

    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Change IMarshallingGenerator resolution to use a sequential design instead of recursive #96632
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 9.0.0

    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-author-action
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Updating Sum() implementation for Vector128 and Vector256 + adding lowering for Vector512 #95568
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid copy action for root assemblies #96363
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Test #96650
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] WebSocket thread affinity & server initiated close #96618
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add Arm64 encodings for SVE IF_SVE_CQ_4A_A & IF_SVE_GE_4A group #96214
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Hardware accelerated implementation of Quaternion multiply #96624
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Add osx RPATH in corehost #96367
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/7.0] Fix SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated #95733
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.x
  • Implement KMAC #96025
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact
  • Fix: OID's cache poisoning with random values #93661

    area-System.Security, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing 8.0 version of dotnet-dump fails. Possible regression. #37857
    8.0.3xx

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK] [Regression] With .NET 9 SDK installed, it should return that the tool was successfully installed when the tool was installed globally. #37501
    8.0.2xx
  • NuGet Package can't find "latest" version #36637
  • Tool install should raise a nice error when no package can be found. #37860

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2348851 #37856
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [fix #37501] Consolidate message emission for dotnet tool install in default verbosity mode(quiet) #37853
    Area-Tools
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #37852
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.2xx' => 'main' #37851
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #37850
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #37849
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #37848
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #37847
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #37846
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #37845
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update the framework for It_publishes_with_or_without_apphost test #37834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them. #37832
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #37831
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add automatically tool upgrade and downgrade for different versions for dotnet tool install #37311
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #37782
    Servicing-approved

Updated

  • Add dotnet package search #36289
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Compute SdkAnalysisProperty at the beginning of the SDK Targets #37778
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • [Wasm] Disable accelerated builds in Visual Studio for wasm projects #37791
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Dictionary expressions #7822
  • Extension lowering #7771

PullRequests

Updated

  • Create spec for const expressions for is patterns #7589

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Docs for targeting multiple versions of Roslyn (analyzers/dotnet/roslyn) #71554
  • Change signature may not update all overrides #71550

Closed

  • Cannot use MSBuildLocator with multiple versions of Visual Studio for different projects #71197
  • Suggest simplifying generic attribute names #67222
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 2/N #71557
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Simplify how RunTests handles TFMs #71556
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fork diag/code-action tests to ones without editor dep. 1/N #71555
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • WIP #71553
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove test construction dependencies on workspace #71552
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Do not report conflicting types errors for source-generated APIs #71546
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Updated

  • Move to 8.0 #71507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move EnC tests to Features layer #71525
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: method type re-inference #71214
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.9
  • Address UIDelays in AbstractGraphProvider.GetCommands #71540
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Make eng/build.sh --test run more unit tests #70793
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update ILVerify bits #71544
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update other BCL to 8.0.0 #71516
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run integration tests on helix #71328
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Separate the process of creating an event accessor parameter and the process of figuring out its type. #71497
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` #70971
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.9
  • Do not compile all types during ENC #71254
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Optimize nullable value type constant comparison codegen #68069
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Doc comment id cleanup #71533
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations when creating CompositeText instances. #71493
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add severity filter to Fix All operations #71486
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Break Solution-checksums into a checksums for pure-state vs source-generator state #71396
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Use runtime helper `CreateSpan` for `stackalloc` of non-byte arrays #71261
    Area-Compilers, Code Gen Quality, untriaged
  • Start local function analysis in unreachable state #71506
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Disallow `ref` to `in`/`ref readonly` method parameter conversion #71531
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Fix implementing abstract method with type parameter constaint on specific reference type #71287
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [Performance] Reduce the work done by remove unreachable analyzer when calculating diagnostics #70455
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Fix NullReferenceException in AbstractUseConditionalExpressionForAssignmentCodeFixProvider #71420
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add some more incremental generator docs #71059
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Epic: IDistributedCache updates in .NET 9 #53255
    9.0.0
  • Scoped CSS Not Working Correctly for Components in the Root 'Pages' Folder #53248
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2024-21319: .NET Denial of Service Vulnerability #53246
  • ForbidResult results 200 status code instead of 403 #53244
  • Microsoft.IdentityModel.Protocols.OpenIdConnect 7.1.2 #53243
  • [Java Client] No proguard file declaring that we need to keep class members #53238
  • [Blazor] Unable to debug in lazy loaded assemblies #53235
  • Error Headers are read-only, response has already started .net 8 blazor #53240
  • Disable Refresh Page When Post Form In Blazor #53241
  • InputSelect not work in blazor .net 8 #53242
  • Blazor webassembly application is showing wrong culture #53233
  • Fluent UI or any other Package Static File 404 Error in ASP.NET Core MVC Project #53230
  • New users are confused by the "Failed to determine the https port for redirect" warning #53229
  • SignalR Firefox tests disabled on Mac #53228

Closed

  • [8.0] RouteHandlerAnalyzer throws InvalidOperationException #50836
  • Move back to NPM #37398
    9.0-preview1
  • Perf regression: connectionclose #53207
  • Perf improvement: json, json #53231
  • [Infrastructure] get-version fails on our CI because node is not installed by the CI pipeline. #53091
  • Re-enable source index #51709
  • Blazor Web App - HTTP headers missing from inside a component when using IHttpContextAccessor #53192
  • [blazor][wasm] Remaining legacy interop #48042
    .NET 9 Planning
  • blazor server signalr JsonReaderException #44520
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor 8 + Firefox routing issue - NS_ERROR_NET_RESET #53164
  • [AOT] Fix Blazor AOT warnings #45473
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [AOT] Make BindConverter safe for AOT or mark as unsafe #45578
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [AOT] Explore Alternatives to MakeGenericType/MakeGenericMethod For Web UI #45795
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Add EndPoint #53183
  • Scaffolded form error: EditForm requires either a Model #53195
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext #53217
  • Perf regression: plainTextEmptyFilter #53218
  • The JSON returned by SignalR does not contain the $type field #52342
    9.0-preview1
  • Build blazor.*.js in CI; don't commit the artifacts #11592
    9.0-preview1
  • Only use keyed services when keyed service provider is available #50277
    9.0-preview1
  • Quarantine Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.InteractivityTest.AutoRenderMode_UsesBlazorServerOnFirstLoad_ThenWebAssemblyOnSuccessiveLoads #49961
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Add option to disable form field as CSRF token source from `AntiforgeryOptions` #51912
    .NET 9 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • [FabricBot] Remove usage of 'noActivitySince' operand condition #53256
    area-infrastructure
  • Only publish npm assets from Windows #53254
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Disable Yarn in Source Build on 8.0 #53253
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 7.0.x
  • Update IdentityModel version #53252
    area-infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #53251
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #53250
    area-infrastructure, 7.0.x
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #53249
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • Update karma.local.conf.js #53247

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Binding both IsVisible and ImageSource to Button causes it to not show the image #19798
  • [ios] HtmlWebViewSource.BaseUrl is applied with an unexpected prefix #19792
  • Not able to change NavigationBarDividerColor on android platform #19789
  • Custom Title Bar Colors not working after migrating to .NET 8 #19787
  • [Android] Crash removing item from CarouselView #19786
  • ShellContent IsVisible="True" Does not display Title #19783
  • [Windows] Crash on Windows, VisualStateGroup Names must be unique #19782
  • NullReferenceException in NavigationRenderer (iOS) #19781
    Backlog
  • Legacy Layout not working #19780
  • [Windows] Custom control based on ContentView not rendering #19779
  • [BUG] Blazor Hybrid white gap/field below status bar #19778
    Backlog
  • Transparency of BottomNavigation View in Shell Tabbar is not working properly(Android) #19777
  • Splash screen is displayed incorrectly in dark mode #19775
    Backlog
  • Warning in log about font #19774
    Backlog
  • Text property value does not change at runtime when using a style #19772
  • More issues with CollectionView IsEnabled, InputTransparent, Opacity via Styles and code behind #19771
    Backlog
  • Scrolling an empty CollectionView results in the app stuck with High CPU #19770

Closed

  • App Crash (Android) androidx.fragment.app.FragmentManager.checkStateLoss #19776
  • .NET MAUI Blazor survey #18022
  • .NET MAUI - Redirecting to AppShell page throws "Can not perform this action after onsaveinstancestate" exception #18159
    Backlog
  • Directory.GetCurrentDirectory() resturns C:\\Windows\\system32 #19760
  • Disable Navigation Page Back Button Long-press Menu #19784
  • TapGestureRecognizer not working on a Frame with a Button within ListView HeaderTemplate #19788
  • Type mismatch between BindingContext and DataType doesn't report error and only doesn't work in Release #19790
  • Physical iPad Air 2 (Software Version 15.8) will not run new MAUI app #19764
  • [Test] Fix failing Android Compatibility Tests caused by #19349 #19432
    .NET 8 SR2
  • iOS - Incorrect Coordinates Returned by TapGestureRecognizer #19327
    .NET 8 SR2
  • Maui TableView binding with custom view doesn't accept input #14464
    Backlog
  • MAUI storage preferences not retrieving the Xamarin forms application properties #15343
  • CarouselView - The specified child already has a parent. You must call removeView() on the child's parent first #16577
    Backlog
  • апп #19759
  • [regression/8.0.0-preview.3.8149] Header in flyout menu makes first menu item not clickable on IOS #17965
    .NET 8 SR2

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable CA1822 in Core and convert eligible methods to static #19800
  • Move GroupListViewHeaderIndexOutOfRange to Appium #19799
  • Update README.md #19797
  • Enable string search and comparison CA rules in Core #19796
  • Update bug-report.yml with 8.0.5 #19795
  • Handle setting of DesiredSize in Measure implementations, rather than MeasureOverride #19794
  • [X] passing test for 18976 #19785
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19769
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • Fix disappearing cell issue for TableView on Android #19723
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/ListView
  • [macOS] Fix `GesturePlatformManager.CalculatePosition` when asked for a relative position #19371
    community ✨, area/gestures
  • [iOS] Fix Flyout layout #19125
    area/shell 🐢

Updated

  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, partner/cat 😻, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • [Trimming] Fix several trimming warnings #19402
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • [Trimming] Add a feature flag to disable XAML loading at runtime #19310
    area/publishing 🏁, stale
  • Remove calls to scoped services on root provider #19593
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Fix SetProgressViewOffset on SwipeRefreshLayout #19767
  • [Hosting] Register ImageSource services as KeyedServices #19641
    area/app-size 🤏, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Android] Make Flyout footer aware of header/content margin #19303
    platform/android 🤖, area/shell 🐢
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
  • [X] CSS specificity #19335
    area/Xaml </>
  • Add basic docs for ScrollView implementations #19766
  • [Android] Fix RefreshView loading indicator position #17647

    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query contains non-consecutive table aliases when tables are pruned #32757
  • When using separate migrations assembly, the output path is not relative to target project #32752
  • EF Core 8 - Oracle - Ignore Case Sensitivity in Primary Key Column Leads to Incorrect Data Loading #32751
  • ISaveChangesInterceptor.SaveChangesFailed is not triggered by DbUpdateConcurrencyException #32750
  • AsSplitQuery not working with sort string.Join #32749

Closed

  • Make LinqToCSharpSyntaxTranslator more resilient to multiple declaration of the same variable in nested scopes #32716
    9.0.0
  • Short cut for Script-Migration the last migration #32744
  • SqliteTransaction.Dispose() leaves an orphaned transaction instance in the connection if RollbackInternal() throws #25119
    9.0.0
  • Left Join (GroupJoin-DefaultIfEmpty-SelectMany) will not be translated with ExpressionVisitor if no cache can hit #32742

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32759
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #32758
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [release/8.0] Change the return type of OwnedNavigationBuilder.PrimitiveCollection #32753
    Servicing-consider

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #32755
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #32756
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #32754
  • Fix complex assignment operator handling in LinqToCSharpSyntaxTranslator #32715
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Cleanup when error occurs on dispose. #32605
  • Produce uncorrelated IN for Contains with nullable item #32575

Updated

  • Add --disable-build-servers to bundle command #32737
  • [release/8.0] Don't try to cast negative enum values to ulong #32731
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0] Don't detect join table with other incoming references as a simple join table #32729
    Servicing-consider, 8.0.x
  • Generate change-tracking delegates in the compiled model. #31443
